download_links.label: L1000 Characteristic Direction Coefficient Tables (Level 5)
download_links.markdown_sublabel: **All L1000 data that is provided here are derivative work that is significantly different from what is provided at [clue.io](https://clue.io), the original source of these data. The original data and signatures profiled and computed by the LINCS Broad Transcriptomics Data and Signature Generation Center (DSGC) are available from [clue.io](https://clue.io).**

UpDown.description: Enter up and down gene sets to identify reversers and mimickers from over 1.5 million signatures

linked_form.label: Alternatively, you can query a single gene by identifying the top genes that mostly positively or negatively correlate the queried gene based on [ARCHS4](https://maayanlab.cloud/archs4/) coexpression matrix:
linked_form.button_text: Fetch up/down genes from ARCHS4 for gene

props.title: Global view of the signatures in SigCom LINCS with UMAPs

umap_files.description: Normalized L1000 signatures colored by perturbation type.
Normalized L1000 chemical perturbation signatures colored by top 50 most represented cell types.
Normalized L1000 chemical perturbation signatures colored by top 50 most represented mechanism of drug mechanisms of action.
Normalized landmark CRISPR Perturbation signatures visualized with UMAP, colored by cell type.
Normalized GTEx tissue-specific aging signatures visualized with UMAP, colored by age group.
Normalized GTEx tissue-specific aging signatures visualized with UMAP, colored by tissue type.
